pr_title: Check expected exceptions precisely in TestJdbcResultSet

timeline.message:
Check expected exceptions precisely in TestJdbcResultSet

Replace `assertThrows` with `assertThatThrownBy`.

Improve running TestJdbcResultSetCompatibilityOldServer from IDE

Previously running the test from IDE required setting
TESTED_PRESTO_SERVER_VERSIONS environment.

timeline.bodyText: Hmmm. It was still useful to be able to test agains specific versions manually. Maybe not enough to keep it... IDK
timeline.author: losipiuk
